titlestmt.titleproper: Joseph Jabez and Mary E. Meredith Baily correspondence 1849-1897
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Joseph Jabez and Mary E. Meredith Baily correspondence
did.repository: University of Delaware Special Collections Department Morris Library, 181 South College Avenue Newark, DE 19717-5267

bioghist.p: Mary E. Meredith married Jabez Baily. They had a son, Isaac Meredith Baily. Isaac died in his freshman year at Swarthmore College of scarlet fever. Isaac had at least one brother, Joseph. Both Mary and Jabez were from large families. Mary had a sister Hannah and a brother Joseph. Jabez had two sisters, Sarah Green and Hannah Jure, and a brother Harvey. The families lived in Chester County.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of Baily family letters. Most of the letters are to Mrs. Baily, of Marlboro and Newlin, Pennsylvania. These include letters from her son, Isaac Baily, written from Swarthmore College. The collection also includes a series of letters from Jabez to Mary written between 1864 and 1866.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Gift of Anna D. Moyerman.

otherfindaid.p: An inventory is available in the repository.
